thread.section_title: Serenity Insurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Serenity Insurance | serenitygroup.com
thread.title: ROBIN SCHUSTER
thread.title_full: Serenity Insurance reviewed by ROBIN SCHUSTER

author: ROBIN SCHUSTER
title: ROBIN SCHUSTER
text: Amparo was well informed, courteous, and efficient in handing my non owners policy with an SR22 attached. I have waited eight years (four years past the court completion terms) to get my driving privileges reinstated for financial as well as long-term abstinence from alcohol, which was what lead to my license being taken (as understandable). I chose not to drive a day in this period. Amparo was kind and helpful in assisting me through this process in order for me to regain privileges that I can drive responsibly. Thank you for making this a positive experience! Driving again will help my employment reach as well as allow attainable other life goals personally and in community.
